## Core Services

### Experiential Marketing
Creating immersive brand experiences that engage all five senses and forge lasting emotional connections with target audiences. We transform products and services into dynamic experiences that customers can see, hear, touch, taste and feel.

### Brand Ambassadors
Network of 20,000+ professionally trained brand ambassadors nationwide who embody company messages and create authentic connections at events, retail locations, and activations.

### Street Team Marketing
High-impact guerrilla marketing campaigns deploying dynamic street teams in high-traffic locations for product sampling, flyering, and grassroots promotion.

### Convention Staffing
Professional convention staff including booth attendants, lead generators, and product demonstrators to maximize trade show ROI.

### Event Management
End-to-end event management services from concept to execution, including venue selection, logistics, staffing, and on-site coordination.

### Promotional Models
Attractive, articulate promotional models who effectively communicate brand messages and drive product sampling and sales.

### Marketing Mascots
Professional mascot performers who bring brand characters to life at events, creating memorable photo opportunities and brand interactions.

### Guerrilla Marketing
Unconventional, high-impact marketing tactics that generate buzz and viral attention for brands in unexpected ways.
